meanings.sent1: My uncle had prostatitis, which made it hard for him to pee.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with prostatitis after he complained of pain.
meanings.sent3: When the man with prostatitis tried to pee, he felt like a leaky faucet.
meanings.sent4: The prostatitis in his body was like a small fire burning inside him.
meanings.sent5: The inflammation of his prostate, known as prostatitis, caused him great discomfort.

meanings.definition: An infection or inflammation of the prostate gland in men, characterized by pain, fever, and difficulty urinating.
meanings.sent1: The severe prostatitis caused him to have a high fever.
meanings.sent2: He visited the urologist to get treatment for his prostatitis.
meanings.sent3: The man with prostatitis joked that he was 'heating up' with his fever.
meanings.sent4: The prostatitis felt like a storm raging inside his body.
meanings.sent5: The pain from prostatitis was so intense, he could barely walk.
